00046         inline void Clamp(float& degree, float minV, float maxV){
00047         float delta = maxV - minV;
00048         if (degree > maxV){
00049                 while (degree > maxV){
00050                         degree -= delta;
00051                 }
00052         }
00053         else{
00054                 while (degree < minV){
00055                         degree += delta;
00056                 }
00057         }
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00061 inline void Truncate(float& value, float minV, float maxV){
00062         if (value < minV)
00063                 value = minV;
00064         else
00065                 if (value > maxV)
00066                         value = maxV;
00067 }
00068 
00069 inline float AngleDiff(float source, float target)
00070 {
00071         float dangle = target - source;
00072         if (fabs(dangle) > m_fcPI){
00073                 if (dangle > 0.0f)
00074                         dangle = dangle - m_fcPI * 2.0f;
00075                 else
00076                         dangle = m_fcPI * 2.0f + dangle;
00077         }
00078         return dangle;
00079 }
